text:
Yeah, can I ask everyone
to leave a comment for the fans?

Oh, uh... Well,
if you ask me suddenly...

Sorry, you don't have to think too hard about it.
Just talk as if you're addressing someone...

If you happen to spot me among everyone
wearing matching outfits,  please support me!

On stage, your... everyone's voices
are the biggest source of strength.

Let's go with that.
Wow, you did that really naturally in one go.

Really...?
Then, I guess someone's advice was good.
